select * from ( select tw.work_number as workNumber, CASE WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM tw.work_start_time)
< 12 THEN '오전'
else '오후' end || ' ' || to_char(tw.work_start_time, 'HH24:MI') as work_start_time , case when extract(hour from tw.work_real_start_time) < 12 then '오전' else '오후' end || ' ' || to_char(tw.work_real_start_time, 'HH24:MI') as work_real_start_time , CASE WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM tw.work_predict_time)
< 12 THEN '오전'
else '오후' end || ' ' || to_char(tw.work_predict_time, 'HH24:MI') as workPredictTime , tw.work_start_time as work_start_time2, tw.work_end_time as workEndTime, tw.work_detail as workDetail, tw.work_status as workStatus, tm.member_number as memberNumber, tm.member_name as memberName, tm.member_rank as memberRank, tw2.workplace_name as workPlaceName, tw.work_title, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY tm.member_number ORDER BY work_start_time ASC) as row_num from tbl_work tw join tbl_member tm on tw.member_number = tm.member_number join tbl_workplace tw2 on tw.workplace_number = tw2.workplace_number where (work_status = '진행중' or work_status = '이동중') and ((now() + interval '2 hours' >= tw.work_start_time) or (now() + interval '2 hours' >= tw.work_real_start_time)) ) as ranked_work where row_num = 1 order by work_start_time2 asc
